title: Create the Gapminder dataset
text:
# Import necessary libraries
import pandas as pd
from gapminder import gapminder

# Rename 'lifeExp' to 'life_expectancy' and 'gdpPercap' to 'gdp_per_capita'
gapminder = gapminder.rename(columns={'lifeExp': 'life_expectancy',
                                      'pop': 'population_millions', 
                                      'gdpPercap': 'gdp_per_capita'})

# Convert population to millions
gapminder['population_millions'] = gapminder['population_millions'] / 1_000_000

# Create a new pandas DataFrame from the modified gapminder data
gapminder_df = pd.DataFrame(gapminder)

# Save the DataFrame as a CSV file
gapminder_df.to_csv('gapminder.csv', index=False)

# Print the first 3 rows of the DataFrame
print(gapminder_df.head(3))

       country continent  year  life_expectancy  population_millions  \
0  Afghanistan      Asia  1952           28.801             8.425333   
1  Afghanistan      Asia  1957           30.332             9.240934   
2  Afghanistan      Asia  1962           31.997            10.267083   

   gdp_per_capita  
0      779.445314  
1      820.853030  
2      853.100710

title: Country Analysis: Japan
text:
import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
df = pd.read_csv(“gapminder.csv”) country_df = df[df[“country”] == “Japan”]
fig, axs = plt.subplots(3, 1, figsize=(8, 10))
axs[0].plot(country_df[“year”], country_df[“life_expectancy”], marker=‘o’) axs[0].set_title(“Life Expectancy in Japan”)
axs[1].plot(country_df[“year”], country_df[“gdp_per_capita”], marker=‘o’) axs[1].set_title(“GDP per Capita in Japan”)
axs[2].plot(country_df[“year”], country_df[“population_millions”], marker=‘o’) axs[2].set_title(“Population in Japan (millions)”)
plt.tight_layout() plt.show()

title: Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita
text:
import pandas as pd import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
df = pd.read_csv(“gapminder.csv”)
sns.set_theme() sns.scatterplot(data=df, x=“gdp_per_capita”, y=“life_expectancy”, hue=“continent”) plt.xscale(“log”) plt.title(“Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita (1952–2007)”) plt.show()

title: Life Expectancy vs Population
text:
import pandas as pd import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
df = pd.read_csv(“gapminder.csv”)
sns.set_theme() sns.scatterplot(data=df, x=“population_millions”, y=“life_expectancy”, hue=“continent”) plt.title(“Life Expectancy vs Population (1952–2007)”) plt.show()
